<p>
[<a href="http://www.familytales.org/results.php?tla=tip" rel="me">GENERAL PICKERING TO GENERAL</a> <a href="http://www.familytales.org/results.php?tla=atw" rel="colleague">WAYNE</a>.] 
</p><p>
HEAD QUARTERS AT SKIPPACK Sept. 30. <a href="http://www.familytales.org/results.php?year=1777">1777</a>. 
</p><p>
Sir, 
</p><p>
His Excellency the Commander in Chief directs that you march your division to-morrow morning as early as possible to this Camp, to the ground allotted for you in the rear. 
</p><p>
I am, Sir, your h'ble Servant 
</p><p>
<a href="http://www.familytales.org/results.php?tla=tip" rel="me">TIM PICKERING A. G.</a> 
</p>
